search the archives of this list... it's pretty extensive.

-Jason

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Clemmons, Scott [mailto:scott.clemmons@...]
> Sent: Friday, July 27, 2001 10:15 AM
> To: JUnit
> Subject: [junit] Writing tests for private methods
>
>
> This is probably in a FAQ document somewhere, if so
> please direct me to it.
>
> How does one test a private method? Is the only recourse
> to make the method protected or package private, thus
> "exposing" the method more than desired?
>
> Thanks,
>
> Scott
> :-> Change is inevitable except from vending machines.
